description:
Bananya is in the mood to do ninja things after reading a ninja manga, so he and Droopy-eared Bananya become Ninja Bananya`s disciples. The run through fields, dive underwater, fly through the sky... but then all the other bananyas suddenly show up. Nyan-nyan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ばなにゃとにんじゃしゅぎょう にゃ
